meanings.definition: The study of the effects of low temperatures on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: In cryobiologies, scientists investigate how cold temperatures impact living things.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in cryobiologies are exploring how freezing temperatures affect different organisms.
meanings.sent3: The penguin joked that he should major in cryobiologies to understand why he felt so cold all the time.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cryobiologies was as deep as the frozen Arctic Ocean.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cryobiologies is as chilling as an icy winter night.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the effects of low temperatures on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Cryobiologies is a fascinating field that focuses on how cold impacts living creatures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists specializing in cryobiologies study how organisms react to extreme cold.
meanings.sent3: The cryobiologies department at the university always keeps the air conditioning on high, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for cryobiologies was as intense as a blizzard in the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The mysteries of cryobiologies are as intriguing as a snowflake under a microscope.
